name: Ataraxia (JazaryGames)
description:
* Game is in early development

Discord Server

Patreon

Ataraxia is a horse themed third person RPG game where you can tame, collect, breed and sell unique horses. There will be an in depth stat system for horses and the player as well as many unique horse shapes, sizes and colors, and a rarity system! There will be plenty of events where players can share their horses and enter into events such as horse racing and more.
